title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned for a correct integrand

1 point is earned for appropriate limits and kπ

1 point is earned for correct antiderivative

1 point is earned for substitution and/or evaluation

Discs:

V=π  ∫ 3 5 ( x 2 −9) dx     =π  [ 1 3 x 3 −9x ] 3 5     =π[ ( 125 3 −45 )−(9−27) ]= 44 3 π

or

Shells:

V=2π ∫ 0 4 ( 5− 9+ y 2 )ydy     =2π  [   5 2 y 2 − 1 3 ( 9+ y 2 ) 3 2   ] 0 4       =2π( 40− 125 3   + 27 3 )= 44 3 π
